topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5339f51b636872706c570000#post_5339f51b636872706c570000
Eh, my online friends were worse.

<-- Ex-furry who at the time just wanted to read webcomics and stuff pre-2007 . . . You can probably guess how that went.

My experience back then in a nutshell interacting with others:
Your average furry back then, "How dare you say a furry is just a hobby?!  How dare you say that furry isn't a sexuality!  Christian n****r fundie!  I'm going to track you down and chop your balls off for calling them just cartoons! Fuck you I'm a dragon!"

I quit I think 2008 or 2009 and sure the mods on their sites massively cracked down on the death threats, but good lord the fact they had people threatening to kill others over cartoons?
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
